DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate human body absorb metabolize two herbal drug . The information critical drug development could obtain study use animal . The two herbal drug decursin decursinol angelate ( DA ) naturally exist traditional herb Angelica gigas Nakai ( AGN ) . Preclinical clinical study indicate AGN decursin/DA quite safe animal human .
DOC.criteria: Health subject weigh 50 91 kilogram ( 110 200 pound ) Subjects 18 65 year age Subjects normal hepatic , renal bone marrow function assess history , physical clinical chemistry analysis Subjects positive HIV , HBV HCV Subjects diabetes—due length fast Subjects regularly take kind prescription medication Subjects take oral contraception , hormonecontaining IUDs , contraception implant , Depo medroxyprogesterone injection Subjects take food herbal supplement contain AGN ( e.g . CognIQTM , DCursinol , Decursinol50™ , Ache Action™ , FastActing Joint Formula , EstroG100™ ) within 30 day study . Female subject pregnant , < 6 month postpartum , breastfeed woman .
